name: Adult Outpatient Clinic
description: All of RAMS Adult/Older Adult Outpatient services are provided on-site at RAMS Outpatient Clinic in San Francisco’s Richmond District. Services include: - Individual, Couples, Family, and Group Counseling - Clinical Case Management - Crisis Intervention - Psychiatric Evaluation and Medical Management - Psychological Testing and Assessment - Psychoeducation - Information & Referral Services - Consultation - Peer Support Groups, Peer Advocacy, and Social Activities Although services are available

howToGetIt: For more information the Intakes Line at: (415) 668 5955 Ext. 327
cost: We serve low-income individuals and families with public health insurance, including Medi-Cal and Medicare and those without health insurance.
